tags.name: Security
tags.description: Authentication is done by a user name or email plus a password. The login function returns a JSON Web Token (JWT) once authenticated, that should be included with subsequent API calls to authenticate the user. The JWT will expire after a while for security, at which point you may need to log in again.

tags.name: User
tags.description: Users can be assigned roles for Organizations, allowing them to view or manage resources associated with the Organizations.

tags.name: Role
tags.description: Roles can be assigned to users for Organizations, allowing the users to view or manage resources associated with the Organizations.

tags.name: Organization
tags.description: Organizations group a set of resources together, for example Apps, App Instances, or Cloudlets. Users given a role in an Organization can operate on those resources in the scope provided by their role.

tags.name: OperatorCode
tags.description: OperatorCode maps a carrier code to an Operator organization name.

tags.name: Flavor
tags.description: Flavors define the compute, memory and storage capacity of computing instances. To put it simply, a flavor is an available hardware configuration for a server. It defines the size of a virtual server that can be launched.

tags.name: AutoProvPolicy
tags.description: AutoProvPolicy defines the automated provisioning policy.

tags.name: AppAutoProvPolicy
tags.description: AutoProvPolicy belonging to an app.

tags.name: AutoScalePolicy
tags.description: AutoScalePolicy defines when and how ClusterInsts will have their nodes scaled up or down.

tags.name: PrivacyPolicy
tags.description: PrivacyPolicy defines security restrictions for cluster instances nodes scaled up or down.

tags.name: AutoProvPolicyCloudlet
tags.description: AutoProvPolicyCloudlet belong to a cloudlet.

tags.name: VMPool
tags.description: Pool of VMs to be part of a Cloudlet.

tags.name: VMPoolMember
tags.description: Members belong to a VMPool.

tags.name: Cloudlet
tags.description: Cloudlet is a set of compute resources at a particular location, provided by an Operator.

tags.name: CloudletPool
tags.description: CloudletPool defines a pool of Cloudlets that have restricted access.

tags.name: CloudletPoolMember
tags.description: Member belong to a cloudlet pool.

tags.name: ClusterInst
tags.description: ClusterInst is an instance of a Cluster on a Cloudlet. It is defined by a Cluster, Cloudlet, and Developer key.

tags.name: App
tags.description: Provides information about the developer's application.

tags.name: AppInst
tags.description: AppInst is an instance of an App on a Cloudlet where it is defined by an App plus a ClusterInst key.

tags.name: CloudletProps
tags.description: Infra properties used to setup cloudlet.

tags.name: CloudletResMap
tags.description: Cloudlet resouce mapping.

tags.name: FlavorMatch
tags.description: To match a flavor with platform flavor.

tags.name: AppInstClientKey
tags.description: Client is an AppInst client that called FindCloudlet DME Api.

tags.name: ExecRequest
tags.description: ExecRequest is a common struct for enabling a connection to execute some work on a container.

tags.name: DeveloperMetrics
tags.description: Collection of statistcs related to Client/App/Cluster.

tags.name: OperatorMetrics
tags.description: Collection of statistcs related to Cloudlet.

tags.name: Events
tags.description: Collection of event/audit logs from edge services.

tags.name: DeveloperUsage
tags.description: Usage details of App/Cluster.

tags.name: OperatorUsage
tags.description: Usage details of Cloudlet.

tags.name: AlertReceiver
tags.description: Manage receiver for alerts from edge services.
